author: Reuters
content: KUALA LUMPUR: Malaysian biodiesel production is likely to hit record levels this year and next. The 2018 exports are on track to double from 2017, pushed up as higher oil prices boost the appeal of biofuels, the head of an industry association said on Wednesd… [+1466 chars]
description: Exports for this year are on track to double from 2017, pushed up as higher oil prices boost the appeal of biofuels.
title: Malaysia’s biodiesel output, exports set to hit record high level

author: Will Horner
content: Global stocks advanced Wednesday, as a rally in the U.S. spread across Asia and continued in Europe. The Stoxx Europe 600 was up 0.4% in early trading. In Asia, the Shanghai Composite gained 0.6%, Hong Kongs Hang Seng was up 0.8% and Japans Nikkei climbed 1.3… [+2052 chars]
description: Stocks in Asia and Europe advanced after a rally in the U.S. in which the Dow rose more than 500 points. Futures pointed to a small opening gain for U.S. stocks.
title: Global Stocks Extend Rebound

description: On November 4, a second batch of potentially more crippling sanctions will be re-imposed on Iran's oil and shipping sectors as well as its central bank.
title: US, India have a goal of denying Iran money it needs to destabilise the Middle East, says official

title: Raymond falls 3% on Vijaypat Singhania's exit
